mapper.select: select si_name from seller_info where si_seq =#{si_seq}
select pimg_file_name from prod_image where pimg_uri = #{uri}
select cate_name from category where cate_seq =#{cate_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prod_image (pimg_file_name, pimg_uri, pimg_size) VALUES (#{pimg_file_name},#{pimg_uri},#{pimg_size});
mapper.update: UPDATE product_info SET pi_name=#{pi_name}, pi_cate_seq=#{pi_cate_seq}, pi_stock=#{pi_stock}, pi_discount_rate=#{pi_discount_rate}, pi_caution=#{pi_caution}, pi_weight=#{pi_weight}, pi_point_rate=#{pi_point_rate}, pi_di_seq=#{pi_di_seq}, pi_price=#{pi_price}, pi_img_uri=#{pi_img_uri} where pi_seq = #{pi_seq}
